artifacts.name: Enchanted Crystal Ball
artifacts.description: A mystical crystal ball with the power of scrying and divination.

artifacts.name: Phoenix Feather Wand
artifacts.description: A wand crafted from a genuine phoenix feather, perfect for casting powerful spells.

artifacts.name: Cursed Mirror of Reflection
artifacts.description: A mirror with a dark history, said to reflect the true nature of those who gaze into it.

artifacts.name: Vampire Fang Amulet
artifacts.description: An amulet containing a genuine vampire fang, believed to offer protection against supernatural forces.

artifacts.name: Haunted Ouija Board
artifacts.description: A classic Ouija board with a spooky twist, rumored to communicate with spirits.

artifacts.name: Witch's Broomstick
artifacts.description: A traditional broomstick imbued with magical properties, perfect for flying.

artifacts.name: Eldritch Rune Stones
artifacts.description: A set of ancient rune stones, believed to harness mystical energies for various purposes.

artifacts.name: Glowing Fairy Dust Vial
artifacts.description: A vial filled with sparkling fairy dust, said to bring luck and positive energy.

artifacts.name: Ghostly Lantern
artifacts.description: A lantern that emits an ethereal glow, believed to attract and communicate with spirits.

artifacts.name: Moonstone Talisman
artifacts.description: A talisman crafted from a rare moonstone, known for enhancing intuition and psychic abilities.

artifacts.name: Banshee's Wail Earrings
artifacts.description: Earrings said to capture the haunting wail of a banshee, invoking protection and foresight.

artifacts.name: Dragon's Scale Necklace
artifacts.description: A necklace adorned with a genuine dragon scale, believed to grant strength and courage.

artifacts.name: Mermaid's Tears Potion
artifacts.description: A magical potion made from the tears of a mermaid, rumored to bring emotional healing.

artifacts.name: Werewolf Claw Amulet
artifacts.description: An amulet containing a sharp werewolf claw, believed to offer protection during the full moon.

artifacts.name: Mystic Crystal Wand
artifacts.description: A wand crafted from a rare mystic crystal, channeling energy for spellcasting and rituals.
